root: ^DAY 4 LOG - At the sub's window this time I see a male adult Sperm Whale. At first I gazed in awe at the majestic creature, before wondering how such a massive beast hasn't destroyed the vessel through the sheer power of it kicking up ocean currents.
^Upon further inspection, I realized that its, in fact, not moving at all. Is it even alive in the first place? But that raises a bigger question...
^What could have killed a whale like that?
